name: Audit Reduction And Report Generation
description: The information system provides an audit reduction and report generation capability.\n
supplemental_guidance: Audit reduction, review, and reporting tools support after-the-fact investigations of security incidents without altering original audit records.\n

rev5.name: Audit Record Reduction and Report Generation
rev5.changes_from_rev4: Title changed from 'Audit Reduction and Report Generation' Control text changes to include 'implement' Minor additions to discussion
